name: Luria's Marlton, Inc., Appellant, v. Kingsway Associates, Inc.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno and Mr. Jxistice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Luria’s Marlton, Inc., Appellant, v. Kingsway Associates, Inc.
Argued May 1, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, and Roberts, JJ.
Michael II. Egnal, with him Egnal é Simons, for appellant.
Norman C. Henss, with him Cohen, Shapiro, Berger, Polisher and Cohen, for appellee. .
September 26, 1967:
